text:
@Yamiche Trump's been told repeatedly the #COVID19 is not like the flu but he keeps repeating the LIE!

Looks like Trump's still trying to convince ppl to rush out there and gamble with their lives!!

#TrumpLiesAmericansDie 
#StayHome
